descriptionNullable:
Customer Reviews help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.

Customer Reviews should give customers genuine product feedback from fellow shoppers. We have a zero tolerance policy for any review designed to mislead or manipulate customers.

We don't allow anyone to write reviews as a form of promotion.

The following are types of reviews that we don't allow and will remove:

A review by someone who has a direct or indirect financial interest in the product.
A review by someone perceived to have a close personal relationship with the product's owner, author, or artist.
A review by the product manufacturer, posing as an unbiased shopper.
Multiple negative reviews for the same product from one customer.
A review in exchange for monetary reward.
A review of a game in exchange for bonus in-game credits.
A negative review from a seller on a competitor's product.
A positive review from an artist on a peer's album in exchange for receiving a positive review from them.
You can see all of 

The source of this dataset is from https://huggingface.co/datasets.
Data contains different products and their reviews.
https://huggingface.co/datasets/amazon_us_reviews/viewer/Books_v1_00/train
https://huggingface.co/datasets/amazon_us_reviews/viewer/Jewelry_v1_00/train
https://huggingface.co/datasets/amazon_us_reviews/viewer/Digital_Ebook_Purchase_v1_01/train
https://huggingface.co/datasets/amazon_us_reviews/viewer/Grocery_v1_00/train
https://huggingface.co/datasets/amazon_us_reviews/viewer/PC_v1_00/train

The data contains the following columns:
 1)   marketplace (string)    - Location of the product         
 2)   customer_id (string)     - Unique  ID of the Customer         
 3)   review_id (string)     -  Reviewing ID        
 4)   product_id (string)    -    Unique ID of the product       
 5)   product_parent (string)     - Parent Product     
 6)   product_title (string)      - Title of the product reviewed      
 7)   product_category (string)    - Different products categories    
 8)   star_rating (int)        - Rating of the product out of 5         
 9)   helpful_votes (int)      - Rating of the product which is helpful for more sales      
 10)   total_votes (int)     - Total number of votes of the product         
 11)  review_headline (string)      - heading of the review   
 12)  review_body (string)       - Content of the review      
 13)  review_date (string)       - date at which the product is reviewed.
title: Amazon Reviews Dataset
subtitle: Reviews on Amazon products
